scripts.assets: rm -rf source/javascripts/scriptcoeur/; rm -rf source/stylesheets/stylecoeur/; cp -a ../scriptcoeur/. source/javascripts/scriptcoeur/ ; cp  -a ../stylecoeur/. source/stylesheets/stylecoeur;
scripts.server: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman server --port 4567
scripts.build: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman build
scripts.deploy: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman deploy
scripts.github: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman build ; bundle exec middleman deploy
scripts.stage: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman build ; cd build ; surge . -d stylecoeur_stage.surge.sh
scripts.publish: npm run pre_build; bundle exec middleman build ; cd build ; surge . -d stylecoeur.surge.sh
